= Notes =
* Has a map of alongshore sediment transport rates
	- Caminada headlands has a divergence in the center
		* eastward rate = 146,000 $\frac{m}{yr^3}$
		* westward rate = 11,000 $\frac{m}{yr^3}$
* From 1940 to 2005, Grand Isle, LA has the highest rate of RSLR in the continuous US
	- RSLR = 1.03 $\frac{cm}{yr}$
